page.title: 02 David's Day
page.content: When I get up in the morning I have my breakfast and get dressed.At about 8 o'clock I go to school. Today,Monday we had Maths for the first lesson.We had a new boy arrive today,called Julian. At breaktime Mark, Paul and I played with him. We played "Off ground it". At dinner break we lined up and later I played with my penny racer. Mark's racer is the same as mine. Before last break we had French and played a game. We also had Handwriting and practised our capital letters.I am writing this during English & Humanities before I go home. At home I will have my tea and will go to bed at half past nine.
